name: Eren, A.I. Assistant Project Manager
bullets: Automated backlog triage and task prioritization, reducing manual project management overhead
Includes workflows for managing video production and software development projects
Added AI-driven task expansion and delegation, converting tasks into actionable subtasks
Integrates with Jira for bidirectional issue management
Supports YouTube projects with OAuth linking, automated analytics collection, and scheduled video uploads

name: Passport
bullets: Automated trip creation by clustering photo metadata within a timeframe and city-level stops
Developed Dart-based frontend in Flutter, supporting iOS, Android, and web deployment
Flutter front end wired to Firebase initialization and multi-screen routing
Mapbox auto-rotating globe pauses and resumes based on user interaction or trip viewing state

name: AutoTube
bullets: Python pipeline to automatically edit, produce, and publish YouTube shorts in one click
Scrape top posts across a subreddit using Reddit's PRAW Python library, then rewrite using OpenAI o4-mini

name: Leviathan Encyclopedia
bullets: Automated encyclopedia entry generation and editing for Ycombinator-backed Leviathan website
Increased platform content depth 7000x by extracting open-source information into Leviathan articles
Built a full Vite + Tailwind CSS frontend and Vercel/Cloudflare R2 backend in a single week-long dev sprint
Consistently reached 1,500 weekly active users since launch

name: Personal Website
bullets: Developed using React and focused on performance, search engine optimization, and unique design
Client-side routing enables seamless navigation between different portfolios without page reloads
Statically prerendered content for fast First Paint and better SEO visibility
Custom animations and subtle transitions enable a smooth, modern experience
